import { useRef } from "react" import { useAppHooks } from "../../context/AppContext" const Modal = () => { const modalRef = useRef() const {useModal: [modal, setModal]} = useAppHooks() const handleAction = () => { modal.action.method() setModal(null) } return ( modal && modalRef &&
{modal.title}

{modal.body}

) } export default Modal
